title: candrashEkharam sadA bhajEham
sahitya:
candrasEkharam sadA bhajEham shAmbhavI-manOharam shankaram 


anupallavi

  indrAdi dEva sannutapadam cintita phalaprada guruguha nutam


caraNam    aSTAdasha vAdyAdi priyam ati shuddha maddaLa vAdya priyam
sangIta shAstrAdi samyutam sanmArga hindOLa rAganutam
(madhyamakAla)
aSTa siddhi dAyakam mukundam aSTa pAsha hara tIrtha vaibhavam
Ananda kandam sOmAskandam aja pAnaTanAnanda vaibhavam
